com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.lang

Class RuleBookRuleWithFactTypeBuilder<T,U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.lang.RuleBookRuleWithFactTypeBuilder<T,U>

  • public class RuleBookRuleWithFactTypeBuilder<T,U>
extends java.lang.Object
    A chained builder for building Rules in RuleBooks after a fact type has bee specified.
